tool_description: This is a free service that will get you the ip geographical location information of your user.
name: IP Address Tracker - Free
title: IP Address Tracker - Free

api_list.name: Auto IP Lookup
api_list.description: This endpoint will automatically look up the ip of your users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-address-tracker-free.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-address-tracker-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-address-tracker-free.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
